meanings.definition: A venomous snake with a rattle at the end of its tail.
meanings.sent1: Rattlesnakes can be dangerous because of their venom.
meanings.sent2: I saw a rattlesnake slithering across the desert.
meanings.sent3: The rattlesnakes were having a noisy party in the old shed.
meanings.sent4: The rattlesnakes of fear coiled around her heart.
meanings.sent5: The museum had a lifelike model of a rattlesnake on display.

meanings.definition: To make a rattling sound, like a rattlesnake.
meanings.sent1: The leaves rattlesnaked in the wind outside.
meanings.sent2: I heard the old windows rattlesnaking during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The coins in his pocket rattlesnaked as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rattlesnaked through the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The distant train rattlesnaked its way through the valley.
